measure.weather: Weather: {weather} / Feel temperature: {weatherTemp} / Rain amount last hour: {weatherRain} / Snow amount last hour: {weatherSnow}

graph.hint: The chart can be zoomed in by dragging and dropping - kind of like selecting multiple fields in excel. You can zoom out by pressing the house button. The chart image, CSV, etc. can be downloaded via the tri-colon (burger). There is then a tabular output of the data below the chart. In the drop down list above the chart zoom control it is possible to view the values by week with 2h averages.
graph.sunlightHint: shows the calculated values for the intensity of sunlight across the day - from dawn to dusk. The maximum values show absolute clarity, the thicker line shows the values with clouds/fog taken into account.
